name: Howard's new toy
description:
Ladies and gentlemen! 

Don't hesitate to play my very first yet charming little game!

The synopsis is quite simple:  you share a house with two talking animals. A humble dog and a cocky cat called Howard Fluffcraft. What happens, when a cat brings home an ancient relic? Nobody knows, except the cosmic Gods.

The game was made in 2 days, using TyranoBuilder. All the photographs, sounds, and music tracks used are taken from public domain resources. Texts, poetry, character sprites, and illustrations are my creations! 

P.S. Howard Fluffcraft and Tilda are my real-life pets.

P.P.S. I would be happy to know about your experience. Please, share your thoughts and screenshots!
